snippet: The publisher contends that the new edition of "Remembrance of Things Past" will be the longest audiobook in existence.
abstract: The publisher contends that the new edition of "Remembrance of Things Past" will be the longest audiobook in existence.

headline.main: Audiobook Publisher Issues 120-Disc Version of Proust
headline.print_headline: For Proust Lovers, 153 Hours Of ‘Remembrance,’ Spoken
